output_list.reason: The 'distr' function allows users to receive an arbitrary large amount of tokens, due to a lack of overflow checks in the addition operation.
The 'getTokens' function allows users to receive an arbitrary large amount of tokens, due to a lack of overflow checks in the addition operation.
The 'mintToken' function allows the owner to mint an arbitrary large amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
The 'claimThrone' function does not check if the contract is locked, allowing anyone to become the king and steal funds.
The 'Mining24' function allows the owner to set arbitrary large balances, due to a lack of overflow checks in the addition operation.
